meanings.definition: Pigments responsible for the yellow color of urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that urochromes are what make urine yellow.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the urochromes in the urine sample.
meanings.sent3: The urochromes in the urine seemed to be having a party, turning everything yellow!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like urochromes, spreading warmth and brightness around the room.
meanings.sent5: The urochromes danced in the sunlight, painting the world in shades of gold.

meanings.definition: A substance that gives urine its characteristic color.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the urochromes to understand the color of urine.
meanings.sent2: Urochromes play a vital role in determining the hue of urine.
meanings.sent3: The urochromes in the urine sample seemed to be on a mission to color everything yellow!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as urochromes, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The urochromes shimmered in the liquid, creating a golden spectacle.
